purposeDescriptions.mid: rapidly sprouting, limb binding viney growths
purposeDescriptions.invLow: weak herb-tropic barrier. Plants will gradully twist and bend away from the Form
purposeDescriptions.invMid: strong herb-tropic barrier. Plants will twist and jump away from the Form
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: extreme herbicide. Plants will attempt to avoid the Form, or die upon touching it
